cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)
cmake_policy(VERSION 2.6)

FIND_PACKAGE(ITK)
IF(ITK_FOUND)
  INCLUDE(${ITK_USE_FILE})
ELSE(ITK_FOUND)
  MESSAGE(FATAL_ERROR
          "Cannot build without ITK.  Please set ITK_DIR.")
ENDIF(ITK_FOUND)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(src)
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
      ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src
)
ENABLE_TESTING()
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(test)
